titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 376) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to negotiate fair prices for Medicare prescription drugs on behalf of Medicare beneficiaries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Hooley. Petition No: 109-1.

bill.summary: 5/5/2005--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 376) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to negotiate fair prices for Medicare prescription drugs on behalf of Medicare beneficiaries.
